title: Motley Fool Money: 05.14.2010
description: On this week's Motley Fool Money Radio Show, we talk EU bailout, gold prices, Disney earnings, Whole Foods earnings, and stocks on our radar.  NYU Economics Professor Nouriel Roubini talks about the next big financial crisis.  And business author Jeanne Bliss talks about the power of apologies.
